#### Overview

## Setup

```{r setup, include=FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)

#install.packages("hexbin")
library(hexbin)

```


## Read in data


```{r, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()


```


## Visualize the data

```{r , warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
ggplot(data = ces, 
       aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
      geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "White (%)",
       y = "CalEnviroScreen 3.0",
       title= "CES 3.0 scores for white communities",
      caption = "CalEnviroScreen 3.0 A Tool For Advancing EnvironmentalJustice") + 
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "red2", high = "skyblue3") +
  theme_minimal()
```
